Description:
Potential adversaries stopping ETW providers recording loaded .NET assemblies.

Author: Roberto Rodriguez (Cyb3rWard0g), OTR (Open Threat Research)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: ETW Logging Disabled In .NET Processes - Registry
Query: sourcetype='windows-security' eql select * from _source_ where ((eventid = '4657' and objectname like '%\software\microsoft\.netframework' and objectvaluename = 'etwenabled' and newvalue = '0') or (eventid = '4657' and objectname like '%\environment%' and (objectvaluename = 'complus_etwenabled' or objectvaluename = 'complus_etwflags') and newvalue = '0'))
